entry.title: Goby Table, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Goby is a voluptuously designed collection of furniture with bold curves that hints at high-end pop art when used on funky roof top bars and in amusement parks. But the series can just as easily aid in creating more elegantly spirited areas in hotel lobbies and resorts.

The Goby Table perfectly complements the Love Seat and Lounge Chair by providing a large surface space to place your things on. But the Table doesn’t stray from collection’s signature form.  Its curved legs are unmistakably Goby and make it a perfect match to its companion pieces. Taking a shine to it? Try the illuminated version.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 75 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Bolt-down plates available.

Specifications:

  • 15.5" H x 43.5" W x 26"D
  • 35 lbs

entry.title: Goby Loveseat, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Goby is a voluptuously designed collection of furniture with bold curves that hints at high-end pop art when used on funky roof top bars and in amusement parks. But the series can just as easily aid in creating more elegantly spirited areas in hotel lobbies and resorts.

The Goby Love Seat is defined by its swaying design lines that make this a fashionable and versatile furniture option. Plenty of room for two, the love seat can create a romantic mood or set the scene for festive times between besties. Need a light? Check out the illuminated version.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 100 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Bolt-down plates available.
  • Cushions available.
  • COM upholstery available.

Specifications:

  • 29.5" H x 75.5" W x 31.375"D
  • 15.8" Seat Height
  • 72 lbs

entry.title: Goby Lounge Chair, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Goby is a voluptuously designed collection of furniture with bold curves that hints at high-end pop art when used on funky roof top bars and in amusement parks. But the series can just as easily aid in creating more elegantly spirited areas in hotel lobbies and resorts.

The Goby Lounge Chair is a high-design throne with a circular form and a little “pinch” on one side that creates a spacious seat and an area to throw back your heels. Whether it’s a party of one or 12, Lounge Chairs can sit singularly, in a circle or lined up in rows near beachside. Using Goby at night? Get the illuminated version.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 75 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Bolt-down plates available.
  • Cushions available.
  • COM upholstery available

Specifications:

  • 29.5" H x 44" W x 31.375"D
  • 15.8" Seat Height
  • 38 lbs

entry.title: Riptide Wishbone, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Riptide is a modular seating system with three primary shapes that make endless configurations It’s made especially for hospitality and other commercial environments but fits in just as well in cocktail lounges, outdoor recreational areas and any space where you might find old friends hanging out together or new friends making connections.

The Riptide Wishbone is the collection’s wildcard. It bends, flares and curves in three different directions and is the piece that allows for the most creative configurations. It’s made of highly durable polyethylene and is UV resistant, making it perfect for indoor and outdoor settings of all kinds. Want something unexpected? Flip the wishbone up on its two feet, push it up against a wall and call it art.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 150 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Available in Ocean Bound material and colors.
  • Bolt-down plates available.
  • Ganging plates available.
  • USB-charging port.

Specifications:

  • 18" H x 86" W
  • 81 lbs

entry.title: Riptide Chair, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Riptide is a modular seating system with three primary shapes that make endless configurations. It’s made especially for hospitality and other commercial environments but fits in just as well in cocktail lounges, outdoor recreational areas and any space where you might find old friends hanging out or new friends making connections.

The Riptide Chair features curvaceous back rests that allow you to kick back, while its flat sides allow you to line it up with other chairs or perfectly conjoin them with other products in the Riptide series. It’s made of highly durable polyethylene and is UV resistant, making it perfect for high traffic indoor areas, or grassy parks and sunlit beaches.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 100 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Available in Ocean Bound material and colors.
  • Bolt-down plates available.
  • Ganging plates available.

Specifications:

  • 33" H x 41.75" W x 24.5" D
  • 36 lbs

entry.title: Riptide Bench, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Riptide is a modular seating system with three primary shapes that make endless configurations. It’s made especially for hospitality and other commercial environments but fits in just as well in cocktail lounges, outdoor recreational areas and any space where you might find old friends hanging out together or new friends making connections. 

The Riptide Bench is the most linear product in this collection, but it’s anything but straight. Its curvy lines mimic gently rolling ocean waves, and when configured with other benches can go on forever. This bench is also the perfect companion to the other two pieces in the collection, bridging the Riptide chair and wishbone with its elegant shape.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Recommended ballast weight is 100 lbs.
  • Product tested to 500-lb static load.
  • 5-year limited replacement warranty.

Options:

  • Illuminated option available.
  • Available in Ocean Bound material and colors.
  • Bolt-down plates available.
  • Ganging plates available.
  • USB-charging port.

Specifications:

  • 18.3" H x 85.76" W x 28.5" D
  • 52 lbs

entry.title: Bikini Lounger, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tonik
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Make some waves with the Bikini® Lounger from Tonik.  This chic lounge chair is the perfect centerpiece to any poolside, lakeshore, or seaside. Guests and residents are immediately invited by the elegant curves and brilliant colors to lay back and unwind. The roto-molded, one-piece shape allows for ballasting and partial submersion into water.  The Bikini® Lounger eliminates common failure points with the elegant, yet uncomplicated design. UV, salt and chlorine resistance means the Bikini® Lounger is built Tonik Tough to stand the test of time.

Materials:

  • Made of one-piece, rotationally molded, specially formulated, high-impact polyethylene.
  • FDA approved and GREENGUARD Gold Certified.
  • Enhanced UV-resistant formulation suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
  • Easily cleaned with readily available, store-bought cleaners.

Features:

  • Sculpted contours for a comfortable fit
  • UV, salt and chlorine resistant
  • Drainage hole

Options:

  • Available in Ocean Bound material and a variety of colors.

Specifications:

  • 36" H x 28" W x 70" D
  • 45 lbs

entry.title: Ana Armchair, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sossego
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Ana: the piece named after Aristeu’s beloved. This chair’s comfort continues long into the evening starting with pre-, during and post-dinner conversation, victuals and drinks. Sporting just a hint of a tilt or swing as the seat moves toward but doesn’t quite connect to the hind legs (ever a nod to the ubiquitous swinging Brazilian hammock), she is steady and sweet and remains comfortable all night long. Solid, remarkable with a touch of intrigue best visible from her profile view, she holds her own.

Outdoor dining chair by Aristeu Pires handcrafted from Brazilian wood. Available in outdoor and indoor options.

Available in a variety of finishes.

Specifications:

  • 32.6" H x 24.8" W x 23.4" D
  • 17.4" Seat Height
  • 26" Arm Height

entry.title: Gisele Balanço, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sossego
Type: Outdoor Seating
Price: 0.00

Daylight is dimming. Endless grassy hills fade gently into the blue of the sky. Gisele reclines on the hilltop with you, full of feminine charm, her nautical polypropylene cording connecting lanky wooden limbs. It’s not hard to understand why this chair was named after the Brazilian supermodel—or was the model named after the chair? Rest in Gisele’s arms once, and you’ll never want to leave. Let her grace ease its way into your everyday routine.

Modern rocking chair by Aristeu Pires handcrafted from sustainable Brazilian wood and wrapped in over 400 feet of nautical cord. Available in outdoor or indoor finishes and upholstered options.

Available in a variety of finshes.

Specifications:

  • 34.7" H x 27.6" W x 32.8" D
  • 15.7" Seat Height
  • 21.3" Arm Height
